Name: Water Heart
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Totodile, Croconaw, and Feraligatr.  Swap a Totodi-Dew and a Totodi-Fang for a Water Heart at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
